body: If you are reading this comment your parents will not die for a vicious comment,and the parents of the person who sent that curse comment will die immediately. For this comment to take effect, please copy and paste it under the other "Your parents will die within 5 years"comment.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
